EntitySets.Name: FinancialTransactions
EntitySets.Description: Collection of financial transactions for administrative operations

Properties.Name: transactionID
Properties.Description: Unique ID of the financial transaction

Properties.Name: status
Properties.Description: Status of the transaction (Pending, Completed, Failed, Cancelled)

Properties.Name: paymentMethod
Properties.Description: Payment method used (Credit Card, Bank Transfer, etc.)

SearchProperties.Name: transactionID
SearchProperties.Description: Unique ID of the financial transaction. You can see the ID in the ID column in Commerce Financial Transactions.

SearchProperties.Name: orderNo
SearchProperties.Description: Order number of the transaction. Orders are part of the purchasing process. Each order follows a process from submitted to complete.
